 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָדַף‎</span>] **verb** ==remain over, be in excess==, synonym of  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סרח‎</span> q. v., only [[BDB#P|P]] [[BDB#H|H]] (Late Hebrew ***id.***, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עָדִיף‎</span> ***superior*** (to); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be profuse***, IV. ***let down*** veil, or curtain, etc.; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***plentifulness***); — 

**Qal** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֶרַח הָעֹדֵף‎</span> [[Exod.26.12|Exod 26:12]] ***the surplus*** (of curtains) ***that remains over***, so feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָעֹדֶ֫פֶת‎</span> v[[Exod.26.12|Exod 26:12]], and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָעֹדֵף‎</span> as substantive v[[Exod.26.13|Exod 26:13]] ***the excess*** in (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span>) length; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָעֹדֵף‎</span> = ***the surplus*** of food [[Exod.16.23|Exod 16:23]], of price of field [[Lev.25.27|Lev 25:27]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָעֹדְפִים עַלֿ‎</span> ***those over and above***, [[Num.3.46|Num 3:46]]; [[Num.3.49|Num 3:49]], compare v[[Num.3.48|Num 3:48]] (no <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלֿ‎</span>). **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶעְדִּיף‎</span> [[Exod.16.18|Exod 16:18]] ***have a surplus*** (of manna; opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶחְסִיר‎</span>).
